segments.text: Excuse me , sir . Could you spare a minute ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you go to work by train every day ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I commute five days a week by train .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And would you mind telling us what you think of the rail service ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , trains are frequent and come on time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Which train do you catch in the evening ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I usually take the 5 thirty home .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And can you get a seat ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I usually have to stand .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you agree that the service is fast ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it ’ s reasonably fast but it certainly isn ’ t cheap . Fares have gone up25 % .
segments.speaker: S2
